scripts.test:unit: bun test $(find test -name '*.test.ts' -o -name '*.test.tsx' | grep -v integration | grep -v 'anthropic\.test' | grep -v 'gemini\.test' | grep -v 'openai\.test' | grep -v 'client\.test')
scripts.test:integration: VCR_MODE=replay bun test test/integration/e2e.test.ts test/agents/agent.integration.test.ts test/llm/anthropic.test.ts test/llm/openai.test.ts test/llm/gemini.test.ts test/llm/client.test.ts test/learn/learn.integration.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:record: VCR_MODE=record bun test test/integration/e2e.test.ts test/agents/agent.integration.test.ts test/llm/anthropic.test.ts test/llm/openai.test.ts test/llm/gemini.test.ts test/llm/client.test.ts test/learn/learn.integration.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:live: VCR_MODE=off bun test test/integration/e2e.test.ts test/agents/agent.integration.test.ts test/llm/anthropic.test.ts test/llm/openai.test.ts test/llm/gemini.test.ts test/llm/client.test.ts test/learn/learn.integration.test.ts
scripts.precommit: bun run check && bun run typecheck && bun run test:unit
